description: Women take to the streets of Minsk dressed in white as they demand an end to police brutality.
title: Belarus election: Women form 'solidarity chains' to condemn crackdown
title_page: Belarus election: Women form 'solidarity chains' to condemn crackdown - BBC News
maintext: Telizhenko's testimony is confirmed by countless posts on social media - photos, videos, stories. I spoke to an American woman who was visiting her Belarusian boyfriend in Minsk - he got detained for no apparent reason. Not only had he not been protesting, but he was asleep in bed when the police came to his flat, kicked down the door and took him away.
